name: Excellence Punta Cana

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I went to the Excellent Punta Cana Resort for our honeymoon between 7/9/07 and 7/17/07. We have nothing but good things to say about this place. The staff were absolutely excellent and the hotel accomidations were superb.
reviews.title: Amazing Honeymoon in Paradise

likes.liked: — The resort was beautiful and so peaceful and the staff were amazing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You should have some general knowledge before coming to the DR, but it shouldn't be surprising for a 3rd world tourist country. When you arrive, there is a $10 entrance fee into the country, and the drive to the resort is about 1-1.5 hours (but the resort is well worth the drive).
reviews.title: The GOOD and the Bad

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Once arriving at the resort we were greated with cold towels and champagne. We booked our room under the excellence club level, which has a separate check in/ check out and seemed to get us into our rooms much quicker than standard guests. We stayed in building 7, facing the garden, which we really enjoyed because it was more private compared to the pool/ ocean view rooms.
reviews.title: Excellence is the right name

likes.disliked: — Could use more steps at the swim up rooms

reviews.title: Excellence "Club" is the BEST !
reviews.text: The room was very nice, with a complementary fully stocked minibar (beer, soda, gatorade, water + vodka/ rum/ gin/ wiskey for excellence level) which was refilled upon request and at least daily. The room had a 2 person sized jacuzzi tub, king sized bed, separate shower/ toilet area, closet with safe, and balcony. In other reviews people complained about the air conditioning, but we never experienced a problem and the room was always cool and comfortable. The matress is VERY FIRM, which didn't bother us all that much.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled with family
reviews.text: The resort was beautiful from corner to corner. The pools wrap around the entire resort and there were always available lounge chairs and towels. We were told the resort was 90% full on our stay, but we couldn't tell at all - the resort is so large there is always room for everyone without feeling crowded. The beach is made up of beautifully white sand and has hammocks and palm branch huts with two lounge chairs scattered down the beach front. The ocean was rough for all of our stay, but we had heard about this in other reviews and were expecting it.. besides the pool is perfect for cooling off; and my husband went in the ocean every day without any problems.
reviews.title: Beautiful, but would not return

likes.liked: — The pool , drinks and the waiters

reviews.title: Great Vacation
reviews.text: Stayed at the Excellence the Week of April 15. My husband and I , went with another couple. Had a great time . Food was great, except for the Lobster House ( stay away). The beach was wonderful. Activities department was very friendly. Thanks to Isabel , lulio and the whole gang. They were never pushy, but had alot going on , if you wanted to partcipate. Your choice. The drive to the hotel was one hour, and a little rough. No biggy. Went for relaxation and received that and more. Second time to DR. Cant wait to return. The staff at the Excellence speak fair english, no problem with communication.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My boyfriend and I just returned from our trip to the Excellence. The facilities and staff made it very easy to sit back and relax and enjoy every aspect of our vacation. The service was great, we were really impressed wtih how good the food and wine were for an all inclusive resort, and there was always stuff to do if you wanted to do anything other than sit back and relax (which we didn't). We enjoyed trying the different restaurants and going to the shows and disco at night. All of the food was great but beware of the beef tartare at Chez Isabelle (not for the weak stomaches). The coffee in the DR is amazing! If I had to complain about anything it would be that if you like drinks really cold you may be a bit disappointed with the temp of your room minibar and sometimes the white wine in the restaurants. Also the linens and towels in our room were definitely on the older side and not very plush. Be sure to bring bug spray!! Other than those minor issues we thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Excellence and highly recommend it. All the staff are great but special shout outs go to Franklin, Isael, and Ricardo from the entertainment group!
reviews.title: Perfect Getaway for Great Food, Service and R&R

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was our first all- inclusive holiday and I know that Excellence has set the bar for all other holidays . I knew that it was special as soon as you were greeted with a flute of champagne . Our luggage arrived in our beautiful room expeditiously we were met with welcome beautiful smiles throughout our stay,,, Nothing is too much trouble and the staff go out of their way to make you feel as if you are so important to them .. it is magical and completely memorable .
reviews.title: Heaven on earth

likes.liked: — Spotless,, terrific food and service , actual paradiseamazing staff and everyone lives up to the name of the hotel.

reviews.title: Loved everything
reviews.text: Many ,many thanks go to our housekeeping staff Room 11111. You were all incredible ..the rooms were kept spotless and always having those special touches ,,eg chocolates on the pillow ,, fresh flowers in our room ,our fridge stocked well and clean towels were in abundance .... the bar staff were truly incredible and noteworthy ..special thanks to Rudy, Benjamin and Louis ... Your going the extra mile and ever cheerful helped make our holiday so amazing.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We absolutely have to thank Daniel in the sports section,, we went on amazing bike ride ,,riding through villages to get a feel of the true Dominican life ... Sam and Sandie (from BC.Canada )say thanks especially to Daniel and Lucas .. If you want to play tennis then book Lucas .. he is superb and you will get fabulous instruction and a really great game of tennis for $20US . Daniel is ever ready to have a game of ping pong or pool with you .

reviews.text: *The food was not excellent, but it was good. Our favorite restaurants were Agave and the Lobster house. The fajitas were excellent coupled with the Presidente beer. You can get Bud Light if you request it.
reviews.title: Excellence - A MUST STAY for ADULTS!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled with family
reviews.text: Let me start off by saying Everything you have read about this resort that has been POSITIVE is true! My husband and I spent 5 days at Excellence with 4 other couples, and we all loved it. From the rooms to the resturants to the pool & beach, everything was perfect. The gym was state of the art. We took advice from other reviews and it helped us to prepare (ie. Lots of $1 & $5s for tipping, bug spray, learn some basic spanish, sun block, and a positive attitude). I have very high expectations for any vacation & I am willing to spend extra $ to make sure it is everything we want, at Excellence we were not dissapointed at all! The staff at Excellence do work very hard to make your stay great.
reviews.title: Expect Excellence at Excellence!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great, really big with an open bathroom incl. Jacuzzi tub next to the bed (seperate shower/toilet room though). Big four poster king bed, stocked up mini bar (beer, soft drinks). Small safe to keep money and passports etc., robes, slippers and a huge amount of bathroom goodies (even a razor). Big TV and DVD player. We got the Junior suite Garden View which is their cheapest room and it was soooo great! I can recommend it!
reviews.title: Excellence is Excellent!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006
reviews.text: Just returned from our second trip to Secrets, and once again had an Excellente time. The service was as good if not better than last July. Floaties were a bit more difficult to obtain, but it really didn't matter because we spent most time down at the beautiful beach. I thought the food was better than last year as well. We ate twice at the Asian restaurant, we enjoyed it so much. We also ate at the Mexican--very good, and the seafood--not as good as last year, no lobster! We had room service several times, and each time it took less than an hour and the food was appropriately hot/cold. We really welcomed the pizzas that were delivered poolside everyday around 1:30-2, and they had a great spread set up for the World Cup finals, featuring French and Italian cuisines. I don't know why I am discussing the food so much since it is not the main reason I go on vacation...I guess because people have been really negative about it!
reviews.title: Second time did not disappoint

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2006
reviews.text: The mosquitos were quite annoying this year, moreso than last. I guess because it rained several nights, so it was pretty damp in the a.m. That and dusk seemed to be the worse times, but luckily we had brought Off with us, so we were spared for the most part. Those who didn't have some sort of spray were really getting chewed up.
reviews.title: Applauso..Applauso..Applauso! Secrets was EXCELLENTE!

reviews.text: To sum up, it was one of the most relaxing, enjoyable vacations I have had. I hope things do not change too much when it switches ownership in Jan. 07. Happy travels.

reviews.title: Great Vacation, depending what you are looking for.
reviews.text: My boyfriend and I visited Secrets Excellence from 6/4-6/11 and we absolutely LOVED it! We both are 25 years old and have traveled thru-out the Caribbean, Mexico, Europe, and the U.S.(Hawaii, Vegas, Miami). The purpose of this trip was just to relax and have some fun and that is exactly what we did. We booked the 6 Apple Square Deal, which means we did not know what hotel we were staying at until we arrived at our airport. We normally are not big risk takers, but figured any 6 Apple hotel would be beautiful.

reviews.title: Nice Resort
reviews.text: FLIGHT AND ARRIVAL

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Four of us stayed at the Excellence from Jan 21 - 28, 2008… by accident...Supposed to stay at Edenh but at some point during our flight down that was changed. When we arrived in Punta Cana Sunquest advised us that we had been bumped from Edenh (The resort was overbooked). Not the best timing. Of course we were looking forward to going to Edenh and had done no research on Excellence so they had us in a bit of a spot. We were told we would be at the Excellence for one night then moved on to the Edenh. However it's a lengthy drive to Excellence 1hr 20min from the airport so our request was granted and we ended up staying the week at Excellence. We were pleasantly surprised. I must say it is a beautiful resort. Staff was great and friendly, food was very good and an excellent selection, rooms were very well appointed and clean, giant pool, brilliantly clean beach (big waves fun but riptide not), beach service (drinks and food), very good house wines, premium drink brands, imported beer, 24hr room service, Beach beds, turn down service at night, lots of walking paths, good animation crew...as for negatives there are only a few, power outages (3) not the resort’s fault, hot water went missing for a day, lack of hand towels in the resort washrooms in the evenings, line ups (long waits 60-90 mins) at the restaurants as they do not take reservations. All in all, a very nice Resort, with plenty of top notch amenities. We had an excellent week that was very relaxing.
reviews.title: Excellent Resort
Excellence could be truly excellent with closer attention to important details
reviews.text: Excellence Punta Cana is a great adults-only resort with a very strong potential to be as excellent as its name implies. It was wonderful to have the choice to either use a lounge chair at the well-kept pool or beach, or to select a four poster bed instead. The food was great and the choice in availble drinks was quite refreshing (no limitaions to generic stuff here). Also, it was particularly wonderfulI not to have to make reservations for one of the several classy specialty restaurants at the resort (Italian, Mediterranean, Asian, French, Mexican, etc) although that policy resulted in unusually long waits for dinner on one or two occasions during peak periods at some of the popular restaurants. For lobster lovers, we suggest the Lobster House. It is a must-try: Delicious! Excellence Punta Cana has a very good mix of evening entertainment options - manager's special receptions, shows, the casino (small, but fun), disco, etc. We particularly loved the piano-saxophone duo, led by Domingo, and their soothing, danceable renditions of smooth jazz with a Latin flavor. Some little but important oversights, especially for the VIP section which we paid extra for - staff needs to consistently follow up on promises; staff needs to double-check the rooms in between guest to ensure that gadgets like in-room jacuzzis and whirlpools are clean and in working condition - that way, guests won't have to waste valuable time waiting on or for repairs/cleaning; the hotel needs to pay attention to and properly maintain the exterior of some of its buildings. A great resort otherwise.

reviews.title: Wife absolutely loved it
reviews.text: 18 months ago we stayed at the Ritz Carlton in St Thomas. The only thing better about the Ritz was that the beach was calmer. But the Excellence in Punta Cana was "excellente". Those who want to be super critical will find things to complain about, like some nights without towel art. Give me a break. This place is beautiful, the workers are wonderful, and you get what you pay for here. My goodness, they even showed up on the beach with boxes of fresh pizza for anyone who wanted it. Tons of activities, lots of top shelf booze if you want, fresh towels at the pool and beach. It was heaven. Like any restaurants, if you show up between 7-8, they will be crowded, but only one night was the wait longer than we liked but it was for Agave which is small.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Some advice, don't take the 4-wheeler tours. Instead, go deep sea fishing or parasailing. Both are incredibly cheap compared to the US and worth it (you will 4-wheel ATV to the boats for free).
reviews.title: Paradise found

reviews.title: It's what you make of it
reviews.text: Just like everyone else, I read everyone's reviews. Before I paid for my trip all the reviews were great and the pics really caught my eye. After paying for my trip and continuing to monitor review, I noticed that it was about 50/50 on how the reviews were going. I had my inhibitions and even went so far as to see if I could change my hotels. My wife and myself are in our late 20's and we've been to a Jamaica and Cancun all-inclusives. The domincan is for relaxation. If you're looking for party spot this ain't it and neither is this resort. The food is average, the drinks are average. The grounds are fabulous. Some of the staff members are great mainly the entertainment, they're about the only one's who speak much english. The entertainment staff, what Luciano, Julio, Kioman, and Rigo will try their best to keep your stay as enjoyable if you'd like them to. Or you can just chill and relax by the pool or beach with a drink in your had enjoying the cool breeze in the warm sun. The liquor is not top shelf so do like I did bring your own favorite drink. If you want peace and relaxation with your special person and it doesn't take a whole lot for you to be cool then this is your place. I made the best out of it, I really liked it and if I just want to get away from the hustle and bustle, I'd go back.

reviews.text: Prior to the incident on Monday the 12th the following things occurred:

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent 4 nights at Excellence from 2/23 to 2/27. This was our first visit to this hotel and our first visit to the Dominican Republic.
reviews.title: You won't be sorry
Excellence Punta Cana
reviews.text: Ride: The ride was about an hour. It was no big deal but then again we have travelled in Jamaica so nothing much fazes us any more. I didn't think it was terrible but there were quite a few potholes.

reviews.title: You want an Adult Playground? Go Here!!!
reviews.text: Resort: Very clean and well kept. The grounds are beautiful and we could see how hard everyone worked keeping it clean and keeping the landscape so beautiful. Everything is laid out very nicely. No problem with mosquitos.

reviews.title: Excellente! The Gem Stone of Punta Cana Excellence!
reviews.text: Beach: Beautiful. It is not the calm Carribean, you are on the Atlantic Ocean and there were some rough waves and some undertow and riptides. We had fun splashing around everyday and wave surfing. Lots of chairs available and the beach service was excellent. Our drinks never went dry and the servicer was always very pleasant.

reviews.title: Loved it!
reviews.text: Room: We had a swim out room over the Cascade Pool. Very quiet. We loved this feature. The room was comfortable and clean but it did have a strong musty smell the first time we walked in but I never noticed it again so I can't say whether it went away because of the air-conditioning or if we just got used to it. The slider did not work properly and the screen was ripped but other than that everything else was fine.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This couples only resort was absolutley great! So much more relaxing than the other family resorts, no kids cannonballing into your drink while you are sitting at the swim up bar! The room was great we had a junior suite which had king bed and an oversized jacuzzi tub in it. The beach was well kept and the pool had to be 1/4 of a mile long! The food was very good overall. However Stay away from the Lobster house, I got terribly ill from eating there and had to go to the resorts Doctor. Otherwise Spice (asian), Chez Izabelle (french), The Grill (steaks/american) were all excellent. I think one of the best features is the 24 hour room service, they had the best pepperoni pizza and any thing you order has no fee since its all-inclusive! Overall The guest service was great despite the language barrier (don't even try to order something perpared special, you never know what you will get) but they were very courteous & friendly and every time you passed an employee they always said Ohla! The resort offered alot of daily and evening activities including 30 min horseback riding on the beach for everyone complimentary! For a day trip I recomend the Bavarro Tours - jungle tour. Don't waste your money deep sea fishing unless its june-aug as that is when its in season and my fiance spent $150 (in december) to basically ride on a boat as we did not know it wasn't fishing season! Also if you are interested in getting a massage, instead of going to the pricey hotel spa, go to the end of the beach where all the locals have souviner shops and you can get a 70 minute deep tissue massage for only $45!! Unreal! I would definitly return to this resort! One thing They don't tell you however is it is on the Atlantic not the Carribean Ocean like you would expect. That was the only drawback, I expected the blue calm waters.
reviews.title: Kid free is the way to be!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled with friends
reviews.text: My girlfriend and I stayed at Excellence from Nov 30th till Dec 6th. We are 25 years old. We took an 8 am flight and landed early from NJ. We got our bags and cleared customs very quickly. We got in a bus with about 12 other people headed to various resorts. A bus ride that would normally take 1 hour took us 1 hour 45 minutes due to traffic and the fact that our bus got a flat tire. The bus driver had to pull over on the side of the road and change the tire while we were all in the bus. It was some experience. When we arrived at Excellence around 3pm we were welcomed with a glass of champagne and a cold towel. Check in was very quick. We stayed in building 10. Our room was very nice- king size bed and a large jacuzzi, fully stocked mini bar. Turn on channel 21 for a treat. It is a 24 hour free porn channel.
reviews.title: Almost Excellent - A Travel Consultant's Opinion

reviews.text: If you like to relax have a drink here and there...or if you like to party and have a lot to drink here and there this is the place.
reviews.title: Loved it!
My Favorite resort of the 5 we have stayed at there
reviews.text: This was our first time to an all inclusive resort and we loved it. Nothing is ever going to be perfect at a hotel or resort because if it is not the bed it is something else. When we arrived at the hotel after an hour and a half ride from the punta cana airport we were greeted with champagne and a very helpful front desk. They all don't speak english, but than again we are in their country. The english that the people that you will be interracting with is good along with their Italian, French, German, and I am sure other languages that they learn. Yes, a few of the employes spoke more than one language. But if you can speak spanish that you learned in eigth grade you can get by easily.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room that we stayed in was a hotel room, it was on the third level so we had vaulted ceilings. The jetted tub was great, the shower fit both me and my wife. The water pressure was not bad. There were enough towels and 2 robes as well as slippers in the room. The fridge was stocked with their domestic beer and juices as well as bottled water and was restocked when it was depleted with the respective drinks. There was no charge for the mini bar. We used room service and it was a little slow and one night our order was never put in and when we called they were very apologitic and had the new order up in 30 min. The food, we thought, was good and great it just depended on what we ordered. It was not the best I have had, but than again the best that I have had I also had to pay for every time I ate it. We spent a lot of time at the resort either on the beach or at the pool. The drinks were great and the atmosphere was great. I kind of compare it to a cruise which I have been on 2, but instead of sailing you are on land and your alcohol is included...again which we loved...I can go on and on but if you would like to know more feel free to ask. On a scale of 5 stars I give this a 4
reviews.title: Love the Tenis instructor Rolando and the sports bartender Andres

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We just returned from a wonderful stay at the Execellence in Punta Cana DR. I could not say enough good things about this resort. It was our second visit here and it was even better than the last. Previously known as Secrets Excellence now just Excellence, many improvements have been made. From hammocks on the beach hung between two palm trees, to terrific food. The grouds were as beautiful as I remembered and the staff could not do enough for you. Room service was great, not a long wait and food was hot and delicious. I would recommend this resort to everyone who plans to take a visit to the Dominican Republic, you will not regret it. We booked though Cheap Caribbean with ease, the price was $3200.00 and worth every penny. It was a long ride from the Punta Cana Airport to the resort about an hour but it was worth it.
reviews.title: Great swimmimg, Spanish lessons & food...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Greg and Betty Lord
reviews.title: Great hotel - but beware the sea off this particular hotel's beach!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This place was unbelievable! Although the ride is about an hour to get there, it was well worth it. We were greeted at the steps of the resort with flutes of champagne and a warm welcome. The room was just beautiful and cheerful. Although we had a heavy breeze at the beach, it was comfortable and made for some great surf to play in. The pool was extremely clean and comfortable to float around in with your "drink of the day". Each day there was another tropical drink that greeted us wherever we were. The staff was so friendly, courtious and just wonderful. I know other people have commented that they did not like the food, but let me tell you - the presentation was georgeous and the taste was delicious! The only thing I can think of is that anyone complaining obviously likes to eat boxed mac and cheese and raymen noodles. Of the seven restaurants and our six night stay, we ate in each one and they were all fantastic! We were very sad to go home. We are a married couple in our late 30's with two kids and let me say... this was just what we needed!
reviews.title: Fantastic Getaway!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall, we think Excellence was at it says in their name, absolutely Excellent! The service there was great, they had a great variety of food (there was only one night where 2 of the 7 restaurants were closed so they could put some of the beach party indoors) and drinks (you could order practically anything you wanted) and it was all included!
reviews.title: Loved the resort, great place to have a wedding

likes.liked: — Excellent Service, View, Food, Bars, Beach, Wedding, Honeymoon
likes.disliked: — 1 hr from airport, people claiming beach chairs and not using them

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed for 6 nights (due to the airlines-supposed to be 7) in the Excellence Club. Our room was beautiful, the housekeepers did a great job. They decorated our bed with a beautiful "towel art" almost every day. I would recommend tipping them a dollar a day or so although it is not required. The mini bar was restocked every day with peanuts, oreos, crackers, a variety of pop, plenty of bottled water, beer, wine, and a few different kinds of hard alcohol.
reviews.title: "Excellent" Trip to Excellence Punta Cana

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We were also married on Monday, 4/14/08. We had a fairly small wedding with just us and four family members. Our wedding coordinator did an excellent job. We ended up having an absolutely beautiful wedding that flowed well. We planned most everything as far as the date and everything over email. She answered all of our questions and made it a worry-free experience. We met with her the day after we arrived and picked out our cake, flowers, location of the wedding, and the restaurant that we wanted to have dinner with our family at. We had our wedding in a gazebo by the beach. The justice of the peace came for the ceremony and Angela (the wedding coordinator) translated it to English for us.
reviews.title: Great place for a relaxing beach vacation

likes.disliked: — room qualtiy not on par with rest of resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled solo
reviews.text: We had the photographer at the resort do our photography. We had an hour photo session before the wedding which consisted of pictures all over the resort, in the garden, on the beach, etc. He also took pictures at our ceremony. We only purchased the package of 36 5x7 color photos with the CD negative for $580. He gave us the proofs to all of the pictures the day after to take back to our room and decide which ones we wanted. We got to choose the 36 we wanted in print and then we also got all of the 153 pictures he took on the CD so we can print them at home as we would like. Overall, the photographer did an excellent job and we ended up with some very nice pictures.
reviews.title: A great place for drunk, clueless, cheap cruise ship types

likes.liked: — one night i had a decent pizza and the room service waiter was exceptional

reviews.title: Wedding & honeymoon- spectacular!!
reviews.text: My husband and I were married on Nov. 26th at Secrets Excellence, and we were EXTREMELY IMPRESSED! I can be your typical overly picky New Yorker, and after reading many reviews on Trip Advisor I wasn't sure what we were going to find. Although the drive to and from the airport is long (we will take the heilcopter next time) when we pulled up to the resort it was soooo worth the trip! We found the staff to be very accomodating. Our wedding ceremony was beautiful, the food was great (Angus Beef), and the drinks were wonderful. The grounds are so well kept, and the rooms are tastefully decorated with beautiful terracotta tiles everywhere. I overheard some people in the pool complaining about the fact that the staff doesn't speak English, this just goes to show how ignorant people are...if you were in Paris would you expect people to speak English...no you would have to try and speak French. Here's a shout out to Sparky, Rosie, Holly, Jake, Debbie, and Darcy...thanks for coming to the reception! We will be back same time next year for our first anniversery!

reviews.title: what a wonderfull place !
reviews.text: My wife nad I had our honeymoon from 13th November till 19th November at the Secrets. We had a wonderful time in the hotel. Everthing is very clean, the rooms are very nice and the food in all restaurants is very, very good. The pool is breathtaking and you always will find a bed ore a float. The beach is very nice, the only disapointment was that we couldn`t swim in the ocean because of the big waves.The best of all are the employees. They are very friendly and the service is absolut great.

reviews.title: Had a great time, just what we needed.
reviews.text: I really don`t understand the bad reviews of a few people, but i think there are always some people - you can do what you want and they are still not happy (the best for them would be to stay at home ). But don`t hear to them, go to the Secrets and have a great time there. We always go to 5 star hotels and we only can say that the Secrets is very good 5 star hotel.

reviews.title: We spent a marvellous week at this great hotel
reviews.text: Wow I miss that place already. Vacation time (11/12-11/17)

reviews.title: This is a great resort!!
reviews.text: My husband and I went to secrets celebrating our 10yr anniversary and enjoy every minute of it. Yes, there were a few confusions here and there but nothing major to ruin our trip.

reviews.title: We had a great time
reviews.text: I like many other had been watching the latest reviews as our trip approached and had grown very aprehensive. The "live from secrets" reviews helped to ease some of those, as well as posting on here and asking some questions.

reviews.title: Believe the positive reviews question the negitive
reviews.text: We arrived at Secrets and were taken to the Excellence Club for check in. Champagne and 10 minutes later we were in our room.

reviews.title: Secrets Punta Cana "It's All Good"
reviews.text: I will break down the rest of the review:

reviews.title: The best Vacation Ever !
reviews.text: Food: Food was good. It was not great all the time, but it was good and there was always something that we could find to eat that we liked.

reviews.title: Very Nice Place To Get The Poops!
reviews.text: Breakfast buffet was very good. Food and juice were replenished quckly when they got low.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Not sure if I stayed at the same place as the person below me because I just returned yesterday from a 9 day stay at this resort. I went there with my new bride for our honeymoon and it exceeded all expectations I had for it. We were in an ocean view jr. suite in the Excellence club which I recommend for the extra money. We got the Honeymoon package which gives you a couples message and facial, I dinner for 2on the beach and breakfast in bed on a morning of your choosing. All just fantastic. While having dinner on the beach, they run your jacuzzi for you with bubbles, and throw rose peddels all over the bubbles. My wife loved that touch. I ordered a bottle of Dom which we drank lounging in the tub. It was one of the great nights of my life and I thank Secrets for that. The pool was fantastic and so was the beach. We split our time at both, took advantage of the beach barbeque almost every day as well. The people who work there are simply wonderful people. There were times where we were saying to ourselves, they are happier then we are and we are on vacation.LOL! Seriously they could not have been nicer and the service on the beach and at the pool were also impecable. The food was good at every restaurant we ate at and we tried them all. I didi not know what to expect from soem of the reviews but I thought all the food was fine. No it was not 5 star cuisine but if your looking for that, you dont go to an all inclusive. As far as the previous review talking about having one or 2 restaurants closed a night. The hotel was not at full capacity. Now I dont know what time they were going to dinner but I had to wait 2 or 3 nights and although they tell you its 30 minutes or an hr. wait, it never was that long. All you did was go to the bar, have a few cocktails and eventually eat. Not a biggie for me. Another thing that surprised me wa sthe bug issue. WHERE WERE THEY?? I didi get some bug bites but I was never swatting at bugs and getting over whelmed by them. You would have thought from reading some of these reviews that there were swarms of bugs desending on you. Mayeb its a seasonal thing but it was not an issue. All and all it was everything I could have hoped for. The only knock I have is that the ride to and from the airport is rough. BUT they are about to pave a brand new highway which should serious;ly take 1/2 hr. off the ride because its more direct. The outside of the hotel needs a face lift as well but as far as the rooms were concerned, but now I am really critiqing. Its a greta hotel, maybe not 5 star but a very high 4 star standard. I recommend it to everyone! Thanks Secrets for a honeymoon to rememeber.
reviews.title: Wonderful!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have to say that I was very disappointed with Secrets Punta Cana. They claim to be a 5 star resort but I would maybe give it a 3 or 3 1/2. Service is what makes a good hotel and I can honestly say there was very little of that..
reviews.title: bad service, very disappointing

likes.disliked: — Waterfall noise not always turned off at night

The resort and service were top notch, hitting the level found at the sandals resorts but for less.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only complaint we found from other couples was the ride to the place from the airport. It was a rough bumpy, speeding, caribbean ride for a hour but we thought it was exciting but some didn't and wont . That said, you cant go wrong for the money.
reviews.title: Amazing Incredible Place!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I will be going back as soon as I can
reviews.title: Most Relaxing Trip of My Life

likes.liked: — The Entertainment Team - Ines, ALta Gracia, Johana, Alexandra, Juan Carlos, Luciano, Franklin, Julio, and Joel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We chose Excellence for our honeymoon getaway based on the reviews here and that it was an Adults only all inclusive resort... and we couldn't be more thrilled!! the resort is large, but not overwhelmingly... perfect balance of entertainment and romance... the ambiance is one of pure romance and relaxation - highly recommended if those are your goals for a retreat! the place is very clean, the air even smells sweet (!), the food is by far amazing (better than we expected), and the staff is highly professional... in fact what impressed us the most is the genuine friendliest of the Dominican people that work at the resort! everyone is super friendly and very helpful! even the ones that couldn't speak English fluently worked there magic with a big smile... you can spend your days lounging by the pool or on the beach sipping their special tropical rum drinks (my favorite, the 'cocoloco' - a fresh opened coconut with cream & rum!), going on excursions (such as horseback riding or riding on avi's to the mountains, etc.), or dining in one of many amazing restaurants... we didn't try the casino - it looked pretty small, but seemed quite popular!.... and, the nightlife is quite diverse: from nightly shows in the main stage of the lobby area - which is beautiful and so spacious; candlelight, two bars, plenty of comfy seats to lounge in; and you can feel the ocean breeze throughout - to checkin out the night club where you can dance all night - to taking a walk on the beach or lounging on a hammock - to enjoying a fresh beach bbq on the beach prepared by the resort.... the list is endless of what you can do.... and, may i not forget to mention the SPA!! great massages!! so, all this being said, we were just extremely thrilled from our experience at Excellence! a big shout out to some of the staff that we remember: Matthias at the concierge desk, Carlos who helped us with our bags and gave us a huge greeting every day, Juan Carlos - one of the talented entertainers with a sweet smile... finally, two our two friends who we named Bob & Barbara - the two parrots that hang out in the garden in front.... what an amazing vacation away from it all!!! a true paradise! it really was 'excellente'.
reviews.title: Excellence was Excellent!!!!

likes.liked: — Service, Cleanliness, Scenery, Pool with swim up bar, food & drinks

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This trip was phenomenal. Althought the hour and a half bus ride to the resort from the airport started us out on a "not so positive" note it was the only element of our trip that I didn't love. This resort is fantastic. Besides the food, drinks and buildings being so impressive we were most impressed by the staff. They were fantastic. From the wait staff to the maid service we couldn't have been more pleased. Not to mention our fantastic bellman or shall we say bellboy, Tony. He started our stay out on a fantastic note and really helped to make us feel welcome by addressing us everytime we saw him throughout our trip.
reviews.title: Loved It!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Like many, I read and re-read the reviews on this website for weeks ahead of travel, and I was extremely nervous about this trip going in.
reviews.title: Great Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My fears were entirely unfounded, and any complaints I do have with the resort were so minor as to be irrelevant.
reviews.title: Loved It!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I did not take the bus ride in. I spent the $288 each way to spring for the helicopter, and from what I saw of the roads, this was money well spent. It was not a more enjoyable way to travel, but they do a bit of a sight seeing tour on the way... The ship wreck was pretty amazing to a guy who grew up in the midwest.
reviews.title: Secrets Excellence; an Excellent Site for a Wedding

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms. I thought we had paid for an oceanview room. I actually got a swimout suite, and my wife was not terribly happy with the lack of oceanview, not to mention we were on the ground floor... for pool lovers however, this would have been a great room. We were moved to room 10105, which is a corner suite with a double balcony overlooking the ocean and the pool. VERY nice view, but not really all that much larger than our original room.
reviews.title: VERY INCONSISTENT!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Food. Some of the food was quite good, and one place was absolutely awful. The steak place and the french place were both very good. I have to say I was surprised at how good the steaks were. My brother actually ate two one night. The Buffet/Italian was ok, not great, but not bad either. Japanese should really called chinese, because aside from the sushi... it was equivalent to any chinese place back home... one thing though... the cashew chicken had peanuts, not cashews! Still good though! Oceana... The seafood place was not to my liking at all. Out of my meals there, this was the only place that really disappointed... since I had so many other choices though, my disappointment was short lived.
reviews.title: Amazing! Top Notch Service!

likes.disliked: — the rooms were cleaned a little late in the day for my liking

reviews.title: Only the beach and people are excellant
reviews.text: Stayed at the Excellence resort Feb 16-23. To be fair to other readers, the resort was terrible if your looking for good (not Great) food, looking for a nice well kept newer resort and if you were expecting the staff to know how the resort was to be run.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007
reviews.text: On many occasions, the staff either could not understand what was being asked or would give a random answer that was incorrect. The food was pretty bad, all restaurants and at all meals. The resort had some nice aspects, the lobby was beautiful and the ONLY reason to go here is for the wonderful beach view! It is a picturesque view, but the sand is coarse brown and the water very turbulent with a constant strong undertoe and crashing waves. A very strong on shore wind, not a breeze but 20+ mile per hour wind is the norm.
reviews.title: Hope to return !!!

likes.disliked: — The beds were a little hard.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The people are WONDERFUL, but they are still getting used to being Excellence and not Secrets Excellence. I would not go back, our stay was tooo long for all dining experiences to be a let down and the lack of organized activity, the place was like a morgue, no young people and not much activity unless you waited until the 10:00 show, which as resorts and such go, were pretty good.
reviews.title: Excellence is right
